title: The Door
occurrences: He hung that cat by a wire from Emerenc's door handle.
Perhaps there are valuables behind the locked door,
and I have no wish to explain why I don't open my door.
It was after he left that I found my tomcat strung up from the door handle.
They're prisoners but they're alive. That's why I never open my door.
The men have decided to break the door down.
If you could just get her to open the door a tiny bit!
I vow I'm not going to neglect you just because you won't open the door.
Then just step outside your door for a moment so people will see that you are alive.
I've got to stay by the door until I've received a package from Emerenc.
Could you run across and lock the door to Emerenc's flat for me before anyone goes in.
If I'd stay with her when they opened the door a lot of things wouldn't have happened,
Did you clear away the rubbish? Did you fix up some kind of door?
the door has disappeared, the animals are lost.
As the doctor picked you up in her arms, my husband fixed the door.
